name: Reverb
description: By creating a sense of distance and space, makes the audio have a different scene effect

inputs.name: Decay Time
inputs.description: This parameter controls the reduction of sound wave amplitude when reverberation occurs. 4. The greater Decay Time, the weaker the sound is cut down and the longer the reverberation lasts.

inputs.name: Damp
inputs.description: This parameter controls the reduction of high frequency components when reverberation occurs. The larger the Damp, the more the high-frequency component is cut, and the warmer and dimmer the reverberation.

inputs.name: Mod Depth
inputs.description: Reverb modulation can be introduced in the Reverb node, which is the dynamic change of Reverb. This parameter sets the degree of modulation. The greater the parameter value, the greater the degree of modulation.

inputs.name: Mod Rate
inputs.description: This parameter sets the speed of the modulation. The larger the value is, the faster the modulation speed is.

inputs.name: Wet Gain
inputs.description: Control the sense of space created by Wet Signal. The higher the value, the stronger the sense of space.
